analyzed: ma log pa ni ngo mtshar lags //
translated: never turns awayâ€”this is truly wondrous.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes shing //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes shing //

analyzed: tshig las 'das pa'i spyod yul gyi //

analyzed: chos rnams khyod kyis gang bstan pa //

original: de dag yongs su 'dzin pa ni //
analyzed: de dag yongs su 'dzin pa ni //

original: slad kyis kyang ni bzlog par mdzad //
analyzed: slad kyis kyang ni bzlog par mdzad //
translated: And later on, you turned them back.

original: gang zhig rkyen las de ma mchis //
analyzed: gang zhig rkyen las de ma mchis //
translated: When something does not exist due to conditions,

original: dngos rnams rkyen las ji ltar skye //
analyzed: dngos rnams rkyen las ji ltar skye //

original: de skad mkhas pa khyod gsungs pas //
analyzed: de skad mkhas pa khyod gsungs pas //

original: spros pa rnams ni bcad pa lags //
analyzed: spros pa rnams ni bcad pa lags //

original: gang dag tshogs las rab grub na //
analyzed: gang dag tshogs las rab grub na //

original: tshogs pa rgyu las 'byung mthong ba //
analyzed: tshogs pa rgyu las 'byung mthong ba //
translated: The collection is seen to arise from causes.ğŸ”½You have seen very well

original: de dag mtha' gnyis brten par ni //
analyzed: de dag mtha' gnyis brten par ni //
translated: That they rely on the two extremes.

original: khyod kyis shin tu gzigs pa lags //
analyzed: khyod kyis shin tu gzigs pa lags //

original: dngos po rkyen la brten grub par //
analyzed: dngos po rkyen la brten grub par //

original: khyod ni shin tu bzhed pa lags //
analyzed: khyod ni shin tu bzhed pa lags //

analyzed: de ltar byas pa'i skyon lags par ; /'di ltar ston pa khyod kyis gzigs // gang nas kyang ni mchi ma lags //

original: gang du yang ni mchis ma lags //
analyzed: gang du yang ni mchis ma lags //
translated: And they do not go anywhere.ğŸ”½You assert that all things

original: lta ba thams cad spang pa'i phyir //
analyzed: lta ba thams cad spang pa'i phyir //

analyzed: mgon po khyod kyis stong pa gsungs//

original: @79b de yang yongs su btags pa ste //
analyzed: @79b de yang yongs su btags pa ste //

original: dngos su mgon po khyod mi bzhed //
analyzed: dngos su mgon po khyod mi bzhed //

original: stong dang mi stong bzhed ma lags //
analyzed: stong dang mi stong bzhed ma lags //

original: de la rtsod pa ma mchis par //
analyzed: de la rtsod pa ma mchis par //

analyzed: khyod kyis gsung chen spyod pa lags // gzhan min dngos po yod min zhing //

original: gcig dang gzhan nyid spangs pas na //

analyzed: gal te skye sogs gsum mchis na //

original: de dag gi yang skye la sogs //
analyzed: de dag gi yang skye la sogs //

analyzed: gsum pa tha dad 'gyur ba lags //

original: skye sogs gsum po so so ni //
analyzed: skye sogs gsum po so so ni //

analyzed: 'dus byas las la nus ma lags //

analyzed: gcig la gcig tu 'dum pa rnams //
